_comment: This file is generated. Please edit .homeycompose/app.json instead.

description.en: Ultimate Zigbee Hub v2.1.2 - Complete unbranded Zigbee ecosystem with enhanced Johan Bendz compatibility. Professional driver collection for 1500+ devices from 80+ manufacturers including IKEA, Aqara, Philips Hue, and Sonoff. Local Zigbee 3.0 operation with no cloud dependencies.

instruction.en: Press and hold the button until the LED flashes
instruction.fr: Appuyez et maintenez le bouton jusqu'à ce que la LED clignote
instruction.nl: Houd de knop ingedrukt totdat de LED knippert
instruction.de: Halten Sie die Taste gedrückt, bis die LED blinkt
